package.name: NoteBoard
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
NoteBoard! is a beautiful modern Message Style for AdiumX. It's the first Message Style that fully represents what WebKit is capable of, ie. CSS Animation.
When installing the Style you'll have the option of choosing from 7 different animations and picking the one that you fancy the most.
NOTE: The animation applies to the followup message only.
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=6218
